div.span: Adapted from Inventory of Greek Coin Hoards

div.pre: 1383 Giresun (anc. Cerasus-Pharnacia), Pontus, 1933 Burial: c. 80 B.C. (M) Contents: 55 AR Athens: 18 New Style tetradr. (including 1 Ο ΔΕΜΟΣ) Mithradates VI: 22 tetradr. (latest 84/3 B.C.) Nicomedes II-III: 7 tetradr. Cistophori: Pergamum 1, Ephesus 1, Apa- meia 1 Ariarathes VI: 1 dr. Ariarathes IX: 1 dr. Ariobarzanes I: 1 dr. Antiochus VII: 2 tetradr. (Antiocheia) Disposition: Istanbul Thompson, Athens, pp. 524 f. To be published by F. Kleiner
